游뽘 Blood Compatibility Chart

Understand which blood types can be used for transfusions and donations

O-

游 Universal Donor

"Rarest hero - can save anyone"

游눌 Donates to:

Everyone

O+

Most Common

"Help positive blood types"

游눌 Donates to:

O+A+B+AB+

A-

Rare Giver

"Support 4 blood types"

游눌 Donates to:

A-A+AB-AB+

A+

Common

"Help A and AB types"

游눌 Donates to:

A+AB+

B-

Rare Giver

"Support 4 blood types"

游눌 Donates to:

B-B+AB-AB+

B+

Common

"Help B and AB types"

游눌 Donates to:

B+AB+

AB-

Rarest

"Precious for AB types"

游눌 Donates to:

AB-AB+

AB+

游 Universal Recipient

"Can receive from anyone"

游눌 Donates to:

AB+

游눠 Pro Tip: O- blood type donors are the most sought after because they can donate to anyone. AB+ recipients can receive from all blood types. Understanding compatibility helps you plan better blood requests.
